game.name: Check3
game.description:
You must try out Check3 game especially if you think that you are the biggest puzzle solver! This brand new arcade challenge is pretty different from the puzzles you previously tried out.  Your victory will depend upon how nicely you are able to make the right moves. Your objective in this cool and challenging online game is to put three check marks in every row and column on the board that you see on the screen. Use your mouse or tap the screen to finish each level! 

Remember you have to avoid placing the checkmarks next to or above each other. One tip that we want to give you is to put a cross on the positions that may not include a checkmark. There are multiple difficulty levels, including Very Easy, Easy, Normal, Hard, and Very Hard to choose from. The complexities and difficulties will keep increasing as you progress in the game. Click the difficulty type and then click the start button to enter the real fun of mind-boggling puzzles!

You have to put your brainpower and concentration abilities to the test to solve all the puzzles of this html5 mind game. In case of any confusion, click the question mark button to know what step you need to take next to move forward during the gameplay. Click the back button to reach the home page and start the fun right from the scratch! We are damn sure that you would have more fun and thrill after trying out classic puzzles from the category of arcade games that are free to play online, no download required on atmegame.com.
